title: Daily Covid-19 cases count hits 1,273 today.
content:
The Health Ministry says that another 1,273 persons have tested positive for Covid-19 today, bringing the total infections registered in the country thus far to 635,606. 

According to official figures, 596,891 positive cases have recovered.

Following the new development, the number of virus-infected people who are undergoing treatment moved to 22,746. Meanwhile, the death toll stands at 15,969.
